![Screenshot of linktree page for echinacea with the text "echinacea (girly pop emo) Our ep “Metamorphasis” out now!!!"](/kd/images/screenshot_echinacea.png)

> echinacea (girly pop emo)
> Our ep “Metamorphasis” out now!!!

For a nice mix of 'girly pop', emo, punk. Somehow their Instagram descriptions also fits really well: '🏳️‍⚧️Music for girls with fuck ass haircuts🏳️‍⚧️'

https://linktr.ee/we.are.echinacea
